key_risks: Environmental impact due to energy-intensive operations and reliance on fossil fuels
Supply chain vulnerabilities from raw material price volatility and geopolitical tensions
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on cyclical industries like aerospace and automotive
Regulatory compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
controversies: Challenges in reducing emissions while expanding production capacity
Exposure to raw material price volatility and supply chain disruptions
environmental_issues: High carbon footprint and reliance on fossil fuels
Ambitious net-zero emissions target by 2050 with significant challenges ahead
social_issues: Strong safety record but ongoing need to maintain and improve safety standards
Ethical practices adherence to UN Global Compact principles
governance_issues: Navigating complex environmental and trade regulations
Ensuring compliance with sustainability targets and reporting standards
